analyzing.title: AI Analyzing
analyzing.description: Collecting wallet data and analyzing with AI.
analyzing.timeNotice: Analysis may take about 10-15 seconds. Please wait.

wallet.connectDescription: Please connect your wallet to analyze your portfolio.

onboard.title: Profile Setup
onboard.description: Enter your information for more accurate investment evaluation
onboard.settingNote: You can change settings anytime in your profile

setting.title: Settings
setting.description: Change settings used for investment evaluation
setting.resetDescription: Reset all settings and data, then logout.
setting.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset?

investmentStyle.title: Investment Style
investmentStyle.stableDescription: Prioritizes capital preservation, accepting lower returns.
investmentStyle.conservativeDescription: Seeks stable returns, can tolerate minor losses.
investmentStyle.neutralDescription: Pursues a balance between risk and return.
investmentStyle.activeDescription: Can tolerate significant risk for higher returns.
investmentStyle.aggressiveDescription: Accepts high volatility and loss risk for maximum returns.

roastLevel.title: Evaluation Style (Roast Level)
roastLevel.kindDescription: Gentlest feedback. Emphasizes encouragement and positives.
roastLevel.mildDescription: Gentle feedback. Friendly but suggests improvements softly.
roastLevel.mediumDescription: Moderate intensity. Provides balanced, realistic feedback.
roastLevel.spicyDescription: Strong feedback. Direct and sharp criticism.
roastLevel.hotDescription: Strongest feedback. Unfiltered roast style for facing reality.

home.noTrades: No trades in the last 7 days

search.title: Wallet Evaluation Search
search.description: Enter another user's wallet address to analyze their investment style and portfolio.

error.title: An error occurred
error.noDataDescription: Unable to fetch wallet analysis data.

asset.noAssetsDescription: This wallet has no tokens. When you hold tokens, detailed risk analysis will be displayed here.
asset.insufficientDataDescription: Detailed analysis will be provided when you hold assets
